select a.id, a.fact_attribute_id, a.calculation_logic, a.indicators_name, a.indicators_des, b.fact_field_en_name as factFieldName, c.fact_tab_name as factName from tb_indicators a LEFT JOIN tb_fact_attribute b on a.fact_attribute_id=b.id LEFT JOIN tb_fact c on b.fact_id=c.id where a.del_flag=1 and a.indicators_type=0
and c.id= ${query.factId}
